Name: market for straw, stand-alone production | straw, stand-alone production | EN15804GD, U
Category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0111:Growing of cereals (except rice), leguminous crops and oil seeds
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20485/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This dataset represents the supply of 1 kg of 'straw, stand-alone production' from activities that produce it within the geography of RER. Transportation is included in this market. considering average transportation distances from eurostat. More details can be found in the exchange comments of the transportation exchanges. A regional market for Europe [RER] is motivated by the low share (in the range of 0.4%-3.8% of total trade quantities between 2010-2016) of import quantities to EU28 from outside (excluding Norway and Switzerland) the Union. Source: Eurostat database, EU trade since 1988 by HS6 (DS-016893), HS6-code: 121300 - Cereal straw and husks, unprepared, whether or not chopped, ground, pressed or in the form of pellets, Assessed on: 2019-05-05.‚Äù

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'straw, stand-alone production' within the geography of this dataset, with the product ready for transportation. No losses are considered during the transportation.

This activity ends with the supply of 1 kg of 'straw, stand-alone production' to the consumers of this product. Transport is included.
